      • newSpeaker

        public void newSpeaker(UserManager userManager,
                       java.lang.String name,
                       java.lang.String username,
                       java.lang.String password)
        Creates an Speaker entity This assumes unique username
        Parameters:
        userManager - The UserManager to update
        name - The desired display name of the Speaker
        username - The desired username of the Speaker
        password - The desired password of the Speaker

      • checkIfSpeakerAvail

        public boolean checkIfSpeakerAvail(java.lang.String username,
                                   java.lang.String time)
        Returns a boolean for any Speaker entity Will return true if the User is available at the given time Will return false if the User is not available at the given time Attendees and Organizers should use checkIfUserAvail instead
        Parameters:
        username - The username of the desired User entity
        time - The time key for schedules
        Returns:
        boolean If the user is, or is not available

      • addSpeakerEvent

        public void addSpeakerEvent(java.lang.String username,
                            java.lang.String time,
                            java.lang.String eventID)
        Adds an event to the Speaking schedule This event must not already exist, and must be available at the time
        Parameters:
        username - The username of the desired Speaker entity
        time - The time of the event
        eventID - The ID of the event

      • removeSpeakerEvent

        public void removeSpeakerEvent(java.lang.String username,
                               java.lang.String time)
        Removes an event to the Speaking schedule This event to remove must exist in the speaking schedule
        Parameters:
        username - The username of the desired Speaker entity
        time - The time of the event

      • getSpeakingSchedule

        public java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> getSpeakingSchedule(java.lang.String username)
        Returns the speaking schedule for any Speaker entity
        Parameters:
        username - The username of the desired Speaker entity
        Returns:
        eventsToHost The hashmap of events to speak at
